summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4215 for the improvement of Federal Avenue, from East Prospect Street to Roanoke Street; by the construction of watermains together with fire hydrants and the necssary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50098, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
